Binary Problems¶

These are problems whose solutions entail bit manipulation hacks.

class catalog.binary.SumOfTwoIntegers[source]¶

Problem: https://leetcode.com/problems/sum-of-two-integers/

static get_sum(a: int, b: int) → int[source]¶

Sums integers a and b without using operators + & -.

Parameters

  • a – first integer.

  • b – second integer.

Returns

Sum of a and b.

Notes

Uses XOR for addition. Uses AND for carry overs. Do not forget to shift carry to left.
